title: Jobs and Workforce
vision: All residents have the job training, basic skills, and access to services that they need to succeed in living wage employment and achieve financial stability

targets.name: Underemployment
targets.content: Reduce the underemployment rate from 20% to 15% by moving 3,000 individuals into better jobs

targets.name: Living wage jobs
targets.content: Increase the percentage of residents in jobs making a living wage from 39% to 45%, placing 700 people per year

targets.name: Pipeline
targets.content: Establish a unified workforce pipeline that supports, tracks, and places 5,000 residents in jobs

definitions.definition: Underemployed people are either unemployed and want to work, or working part-time but want to work full-time.

charts.chartTitle: Share of workers commuting by public transit, biking, or walking, 2015
charts.source: US Census Bureau, American Community Survey
US Census Bureau, American Community Survey
